name: Cornered Stone
description:
You are a gladiator that was just sentenced to death for... unknown reasons. But the locals love you, so you are given a last chance to show your strength before you are executed. In order to make it not too hard for the town soldiers, you are tied to a rock to limit your movement. What they don't know is the utility of the rock, that can be very useful for fights.

Move with the WASD or arrow keys, as usual.

LMB for hitting things with your sword. You can charge up this attack.

Go for the highest kills, or the longest survive time. Comment your scores!

Hit your rock to launch it.

There is a tutorial in game for those that need it.

Big thanks to VGComposer and Firust for music (Firust's YT:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXRQzauDPL2qeCtPV7W0Qmw).
